Type.Name: NextClickedHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public sealed delegate void NextClickedHandler (object o, Gnome.NextClickedArgs args);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the NextClickedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the NextClickedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the NextClickedHandler is removed from the event.
